name: Don-Jon Raskin

trait.name: Brave
text: Don-Jon has advantage on saving throws against being frightened.

trait.name: Not Dead Yet (Recharges after a Long Rest)
text: If damage reduces Don-Jon to 0 hit points, he drops to 1 hit point instead and gains advantage on attack rolls until the end of his next turn.

action.name: Dagger
text: Melee or Ranged Weapon Attack: +2 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. 2 (1d4) piercing damage.

action.name: Sling
text: Ranged Weapon Attack: +2 to hit, range 30/120 ft., one target. 2 (1d4) bludgeoning damage.

description:
Adventurers who undertake the Mountain's Toe Quest meet Don-Jon Raskin, a fearless troubleshooter who has experienced more than his fair share of adventures.
Source: Essentials Kit: Dragon of Icespire Peak p. 56
